snippet: Novak Djokovic and third-ranked Andy Murray won their opening matches Monday at the ATP finals in London.
abstract: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray win their opening matches at the ATP finals tennis tournament in London.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and third-ranked Andy Murray won their opening matches Monday at the ATP finals in London.

headline.seo: Djokovic and Murray Advance at ATP Finals in London
